watering: Water every 2–3 weeks. Allow soil to dry completely between watering.
sunlight: Low to bright indirect light. Tolerates low light areas.
fertilizing: Feed with a balanced houseplant fertilizer once every 2 months during spring and summer.

watering: Keep soil consistently moist but not soggy. Mist leaves occasionally.
sunlight: Bright, indirect sunlight. Avoid direct sun to prevent leaf burn.
fertilizing: Apply a balanced liquid fertilizer every 6 weeks during growing season.

watering: Water deeply once every 3 weeks. Let soil dry completely between waterings.
sunlight: Bright, indirect sunlight or partial sunlight near a window.
fertilizing: Feed lightly with succulent fertilizer once in spring and once in summer.

watering: Water weekly, keeping soil slightly moist but not soggy.
sunlight: Bright, filtered light. Avoid harsh direct sunlight.
fertilizing: Use a high-nitrogen fertilizer once a month during growing season.

watering: Water every 1–2 weeks. Allow topsoil to dry between waterings.
sunlight: Bright, indirect light is ideal. Avoid strong afternoon sun.
fertilizing: Use a mild liquid fertilizer once a month during spring and summer.

watering: Water once a week. Keep soil slightly moist but never waterlogged.
sunlight: Medium to bright indirect sunlight. Avoid direct rays.
fertilizing: Fertilize once every 2 months with a general-purpose fertilizer.

watering: Water once a week during summer, less in winter.
sunlight: Bright, indirect sunlight. Can tolerate some direct morning light.
fertilizing: Feed monthly during spring and summer with nitrogen-rich fertilizer.

watering: Water regularly to keep soil moist but not soggy.
sunlight: Bright, indirect sunlight or filtered light through a curtain.
fertilizing: Apply palm fertilizer every 2 months during the growing season.

watering: Keep soil consistently moist. Mist regularly to maintain humidity.
sunlight: Indirect sunlight or partial shade. Avoid harsh sunlight.
fertilizing: Feed with a diluted liquid fertilizer every 4–6 weeks in spring and summer.
